sen.j: 平安時代末期の清和源氏・桓武平氏の争いから始まり、北条氏・楠木氏・新田氏・足利氏・毛利氏・後北条氏・武田氏・上杉氏・織田氏・豊臣氏・徳川氏までの諸氏の歴史を、武家の興亡を中心に家系ごとに分割されて（列伝体）書かれている。
sen.e: The book is started from the battle between Seiwa-Genji (MINAMOTO clan) and Kanmu-Heishi (TAIRA clan) in the end of Heian period, and the history of various clans, from HOJO clan, KUSUNOKI clan, NITTA clan, ASHIKAGA clan, MORI clan, GOHOJO clan, TAKEDA clan, UESUGI clan, ODA clan, TOYOTOMI clan, to TOKUGAWA clan is described focusing on the rise and fall of buke (warriors) by dividing the story into each family line (biographical style.)
